Texts.Chs: 信徒日记上撕下来的一页。
Texts.Eng: A torn page from a cultist's journal.

Texts.Chs: Buildingbuildingbuildingbuildingbuildingbuildingbuildingbuildingbuildingbuildingbuildingbuilding。因为声音呼唤，所以我去建造。如果我有^red;我自己的远古祭坛工作室^reset;我可以建造更大的寺庙。
Texts.Eng: Buildingbuildingbuildingbuildingbuildingbuildingbuildingbuildingbuildingbuildingbuildingbuilding. The voices tell me to build, so I build. If I had ^red;my own workshop with access to an Elder Altar^reset; I could build even greater temples.
